q1.question: Is this app difficult to use?
q1.answer: No! This app is specifically designed for vendors like you. It is very easy to use.

q2.question: What does it cost? Are there any hidden charges?
q2.answer: Most essential features of SmartHawker are completely FREE. We also have a Premium plan with extra features at a very low cost. There are no hidden charges.

q3.question: Is my business data safe in this app?
q3.answer: Yes, absolutely. All your business data is 100% secure and cannot be seen by anyone except you.
